amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Afghanistan Infrastructure Fund by $279 million and to apply the savings to the Spending Reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 28 printed in House Report 113-170 to reduce appropriations for the Afghanistan Infrastructure Fund by $279,000,000 and applies the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 237 (Roll no. 388).
